title: No Romeo
description: To everyone in Dayton, Hendrix Hunt was the tattooed bad boy, the bully, the player. Guys hated and feared him. Girls wanted to tame him. And I just wished I could forget him.Two years ago, Hendrix was my world. Then the taint of Dayton ruined everything, breaking us both with secrets and lies. I destroyed him and now he wants to destroy me...They say love is patient, that love is kind, but when love is broken it becomes filled with jealousy and revenge.Hendrix Hunt was no Romeo. But unfortunately, just like Juliet, I was in love with my enemy.
author: Stevie J. Cole
